title: 20260113T213658Z__HANDOFF__Optimize-Music-Synchronization-Workflow-CSV-Backup-Integration__2e7e7361
description:
Implement CSV backup optimizations across the music synchronization workflow.

Key Deliverables:
1. Rate Limit Fallback - Automatic CSV fallback on 429 errors
2. Liked Songs CSV Direct Access - Use Liked_Songs.csv directly
3. Batch Playlist Sync - CSV-first sync mode
4. Batch Track Metadata - Batch CSV lookups
5. Performance Testing - Measure and validate improvements

Expected Impact:
- 70-85% API call reduction
- 3-10x performance improvement
- 100% reliability improvement (no workflow stops)
- Full offline capability

See reference documents for detailed implementation requirements.

title: 20260113T185315Z__HANDOFF__Fingerprint-Library-Optimization-Gap-Analysis__c0fbdba3
description:
## Objective

Perform comprehensive gap analysis and optimization review of the fingerprint embedding implementation to enable completion of fingerprint processing for the entire Eagle library (8,433 items). Current sequential implementation processes ~1 item/second, requiring ~2.3 hours. Target: Complete in <30 minutes with optimizations.

## Current State Analysis

### Process Status
- **Total Eagle Library Items**: 9,606 items
- **Items with File Paths**: 8,433 items
- **Current Processing Rate**: ~1 item/second (sequential processing)
- **Estimated Completion Time**: ~2.3 hours for full library
- **Current Progress**: ~677 items processed (8% complete) as of last check
- **Active Process**: Running in background at `/tmp/eagle_fingerprint_analysis.log`

### Current Implementation Files
- **Main Script**: `scripts/run_eagle_fingerprint_analysis.py`
- **Core Function**: `scripts/batch_fingerprint_embedding.py::process_eagle_items_fingerprint_embedding()`
- **Fingerprint Computation**: `scripts/music_library_remediation.py::compute_file_fingerprint()` - SHA-256 hash of entire file (reads in 1MB chunks)
- **Metadata Embedding**: `scripts/music_library_remediation.py::embed_fingerprint_in_metadata()` - Uses mutagen for M4A/MP3/FLAC/AIFF
- **Eagle Sync**: `scripts/batch_fingerprint_embedding.py::sync_fingerprint_to_eagle()` - Individual API calls per file

### Identified Issues

1. **Sequential Processing**: One file at a time, no parallelization
   - Impact: 2.3 hours for full library
   - Opportunity: 4-8x speedup with parallel processing

2. **Eagle API Connection Errors**: Frequent "Connection refused" errors during tag sync
   - Impact: Failed tag updates, fingerprints embedded but not synced to Eagle
   - Need: Retry logic with exponential backoff

3. **No Resume Capability**: Process must restart from beginning if interrupted
   - Impact: Lost progress on interruption
   - Need: Progress checkpointing system

4. **No Progress Checkpointing**: Cannot track parti

title: KM-Notion Sync Implementation - Data Operations Review & Remediation
description:
Review and remediate all Keyboard Maestro and Notion synchronization-related items in the workspace to bring them up to system specifications.

## Scope
1. Review all KM-related workflow items in Agent-Workflows database
2. Review all KM-related user workflow items  
3. Validate folder trigger path configurations
4. Ensure all items have proper relations and metadata
5. Update any outdated references to ~/Documents/Agents/Agent-Triggers

## Required Actions
- Audit linked Agent-Workflows items for completeness
- Verify User-Workflows items have proper documentation
- Check that all KM macros in Notion match local configurations
- Update any items with outdated path references
- Ensure proper cross-references between Issues, Documents, and Workflows

## Success Criteria
- All related items have complete metadata
- No outdated path references remain
- Cross-references are bidirectional and complete
- Documentation reflects current system state

title: Plan Resolution for Issue: DaVinci Resolve Workflow: 2-Way Synchronization No
description:
## Context
A critical issue has been identified that requires immediate attention and resolution planning.

## Issue Details
- **Issue Title:** DaVinci Resolve Workflow: 2-Way Synchronization Not Implemented
- **Issue ID:** 2e6e7361-6c27-81cb-b931-e7ff76fe0640
- **Issue URL:** https://www.notion.so/DaVinci-Resolve-Workflow-2-Way-Synchronization-Not-Implemented-2e6e73616c2781cbb931e7ff76fe0640
- **Priority:** High
- **Description:** The DaVinci Resolve workflow currently only implements Resolve → Notion synchronization. 

Missing functionality:
- Notion → Resolve synchronization for project/timeline/clip properties
- Detection of changes in Notion database that need to be synced to Resolve
- Update Resolve objects (projects, timelines, clips) from Notion changes
- Clip file path updates from Notion for relinking scenarios

Current state: Only one-way sync (Resolve → Notion) is implemented.

Impact: Changes made in Notion are not reflected in Resolve projects.

## Objective
Review this issue and create a detailed plan for resolution. Identify the responsible agent(s), break down the work into actionable tasks, and prepare the next handoff to the execution agent.

## Required Actions
1. Analyze the issue thoroughly
2. Identify root cause(s) and contributing factors
3. Determine the appropriate agent(s) for resolution
4. Create a detailed implementation plan
5. Break down work into discrete, actionable tasks
6. Identify dependencies and prerequisites
7. Create the next handoff task for the execution agent

## Success Criteria
- [ ] Issue analysis completed
- [ ] Root cause identified
- [ ] Resolution plan created
- [ ] Execution agent identified
- [ ] Next handoff task created with all required context


## 🚨 MANDATORY HANDOFF REQUIREMENT

**CRITICAL:** Upon completion of this task, you MUST create a handoff trigger file for **Issue Resolution Implementation** assigned to **Cursor MM1 Agent**. 

**This handoff creation is a MANDATORY part of task completion. Task is...

title: 20260113T180000Z__HANDOFF__Control-Plane-DB-Gaps-Resolution__ISSUE-1
description:
Source: Claude Code Agent

## Context

Strategic review identified missing Control Plane DBs required for framework automation. The System State Radar shows Notion Control Plane at only 60% completion. Framework CANNOT proceed to PROD until these DBs exist.

## Investigation Findings

The following DBs are identified as placeholders (empty pages with 0 child blocks) that need to be converted to functional databases with proper schema:

1. **Documentation Registry** (Page ID: dd2b0b52-1729-4cfb-bcb0-0cddc9856f42)
   - URL: https://www.notion.so/Documentation-Registry-dd2b0b5217294cfbbcb00cddc9856f42
   - Current Status: Empty page with 0 child blocks
   - Required: Convert to database with proper schema for tracking documentation across the workspace

2. **Doc-Update-Tasks** (Page ID: 91f99ea4-e192-46ab-b462-6af054a7f5a9)
   - URL: https://www.notion.so/Doc-Update-Tasks-91f99ea4e19246abb4626af054a7f5a9
   - Current Status: Empty page with 0 child blocks
   - Required: Convert to database for tracking documentation update tasks

## Required Actions

### 1. Create Documentation Registry Database Schema
Properties to include:
- Name (title): Document name
- Status (status): Active, Archived, Draft, Review
- Type (select): SOP, Reference, Guide, Template, Script Doc
- Last Updated (date): Timestamp of last update
- Owner (relation): Link to Agents database
- Related Projects (relation): Link to Projects database
- Documentation URL (url): Link to external documentation
- Workspace Area (relation): Link to workspace-databases
- Update Frequency (select): Daily, Weekly, Monthly, As Needed
- Last Audit Date (date): When last reviewed for accuracy

### 2. Create Doc-Update-Tasks Database Schema
Properties to include:
- Task Name (title): Description of update needed
- Status (status): Not Started, In Progress, Complete, Blocked
- Priority (select): Critical, High, Medium, Low
- Documentation (relation): Link to Documentation Registry
- Assigned-Agent (relation): Link to Agen

title: 20260113T180100Z__VALIDATION__Control-Plane-DB-Implementation-Review__ISSUE-1
description:
Source: Claude Code Agent

## Validation Task Overview

This is an Agent Work Validation Task to verify the completion and correctness of work performed by Notion AI Data Operations Agent for ISSUE-1: Control Plane DB Gaps.

## Prerequisite

This validation task should be executed AFTER Notion AI Data Operations Agent has completed the database creation task. Wait for the predecessor trigger file to be moved to 02_processed before beginning validation.

## Validation Checklist

### 1. Documentation Registry Database Validation
- [ ] Verify database exists at Page ID: dd2b0b52-1729-4cfb-bcb0-0cddc9856f42
- [ ] Confirm database has proper schema with all required properties:
  - Name (title)
  - Status (status)
  - Type (select)
  - Last Updated (date)
  - Owner (relation to Agents)
  - Related Projects (relation)
  - Documentation URL (url)
  - Workspace Area (relation)
  - Update Frequency (select)
  - Last Audit Date (date)
- [ ] Verify database is queryable via API
- [ ] Confirm at least one test item exists

### 2. Doc-Update-Tasks Database Validation
- [ ] Verify database exists at Page ID: 91f99ea4-e192-46ab-b462-6af054a7f5a9
- [ ] Confirm database has proper schema with all required properties:
  - Task Name (title)
  - Status (status)
  - Priority (select)
  - Documentation (relation)
  - Assigned-Agent (relation)
  - Due Date (date)
  - Description (rich_text)
  - Update Type (select)
  - Created By (relation)
  - Completion Date (date)
- [ ] Verify database is queryable via API
- [ ] Confirm at least one test item exists

### 3. Cross-Database Validation
- [ ] Verify relations between Documentation Registry and Doc-Update-Tasks work correctly
- [ ] Verify relations to Agents database work correctly
- [ ] Verify relations to Projects database work correctly

### 4. Issue Status Verification
- [ ] Confirm ISSUE-1 status has been updated to 'Resolved'
- [ ] Verify evidence/resolution notes have been added

### 5. System State Update
- [ ] Calculate new Control

title: 20260113T152934Z__HANDOFF__Continue-Fingerprint-Implementation-And-Task-Execution__Claude-Code-Agent
20260113T152614Z__HANDOFF__Review-and-Enhance-Workflow-Prompts---Local-Resour__WORKFLOW
description:
## Objective

Review all workflow prompt files and scripts, validate the enhancements made to `main.py`, and apply the same local resource integration pattern to all similar workflow files.

## Context

The `main.py` workflow has been enhanced to prioritize continuing existing unfinished work by:
1. Scanning `.cursor/plans/` directory for incomplete plans
2. Scanning agent inbox folders (`01_inbox`) for pending trigger files
3. Analyzing unfinished work before querying Notion databases
4. Using tools for analysis rather than just scripts

## Files to Review and Update

### Primary File (Already Enhanced)
- **main.py** - Enhanced with local resource scanning functions

### Files Requiring Updates
1. **execute_issue_and_project_workflow.py**
   - Currently only queries Notion for issues/projects
   - Needs: Local resource scanning integration
   - Location: `/Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/execute_issue_and_project_workflow.py`

2. **execute_issue_resolution_workflow.py**
   - Currently only queries Notion for issues
   - Needs: Local resource scanning integration
   - Location: `/Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/execute_issue_resolution_workflow.py`

3. **query_notion_issues_and_projects.py**
   - Query script that could benefit from local resource awareness
   - Location: `/Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/query_notion_issues_and_projects.py`

4. **query_issues.py**
   - Simple query script
   - Location: `/Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/query_issues.py`

## Enhancement Pattern to Apply

### New Functions to Add (from main.py)
1. **scan_cursor_plans_directory()** - Scans `~/.cursor/plans/` for unfinished plans
2. **scan_agent_inbox_folders()** - Scans agent inbox folders for pending triggers
3. **analyze_unfinished_work()** - Analyzes unfinished work from multiple sources
4. **continue_unfinished_work()** - Continues work on unfinished items

### Workflow Priority Update
**Before:**
1. Query Notion for issues
2
